short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabEase automatically assigns tab numbers to your open tabs, so that you get to navigate with ease! :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Discover the Key Benefits of TabEase:

Automated Tab Numbering: TabEase takes the hassle out of tab management by automatically assigning numbers to your open tabs.

Effortless Navigation: With assigned tab numbers, you can effortlessly navigate through your tabs for a smoother browsing experience.

Enhanced Productivity: Stay organized and save time with a systematic approach to tab management.

Seamless Integration: TabEase seamlessly integrates with your browser, making it easy to use and enjoy.

Take control of your tabs and enhance your browsing experience with TabEase!"
